description: With the help of neighborhood teens and adults, the garden, founded in 1985 by Project Harmony, has become a haven for people of all ages in this newly renovated community. They host numerous programs and events each year including the annual Mulberry Festival, the Summer Youth Environment Ranger program, and a Harvest Festival & Halloween Party.  The garden has a unique laser-cut steel fence designed and crafted by sculptor Stephen Schmerfeld.  Its numerous fruit and shade trees, bee hive, and pond, and of course the hundreds of flowers, herbs and vegetables attract an amazing variety of birds and other wild life.
name: Joseph Daniel Wilson Memorial Gardens
